com.vmworld.entity

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmworld.entity.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class representing a single financial transaction in the banking system.
    Contains metadata like ID, timestamp, type and amount.
    See Also:
    TransactionType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Default constructor for creating a new Transaction.
      Transaction(java.lang.String transactionId, java.lang.String timestamp, TransactionType type, double amount)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a new Transaction with predefined values/attributes.

        Parameterized constructor for creating a new Transaction with predefined values/attributes.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - transactionId the unique ID to set.
        timestamp - the timestamp to set
        type - the transaction type to set
        amount - the amount to set.
